skillTree.localised_description: His trusted mount, a massive Zombie Dragon that once roamed the Brass Keep.

effects.description: Mount: Zombie Dragon

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.

Undead units cannot be routed, but take damage when their Leadership is broken.
	
	Undead units also have:
	 Fear and Terror Immunity
	
	Undead units may also have their hit points restored by special characters such as the Vampire Counts Necromancer.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

Undead units cannot be routed, but take damage when their Leadership is broken.
	
	Undead units also have:
	 Fear and Terror Immunity
	
	Undead units may also have their hit points restored by special characters such as the Vampire Counts Necromancer.

factionEffects.localised_description: Far away from the Forest of Shadows, the defeated Zacharias plots his return to the Old World where he aims to destroy all that betrayed him prior to his demise.

effects.description: Zacharias is able to collect the Books of Nagash while on his journey for Necromantic lore

Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +15
	(all armies)

Weapon strength: +15% when fighting against Humans
	(all armies)

items.colour_text: Albrecht Nictus was the first grand master of the order of Drakenhof Templars, and cousin to Isabella von Carstein. He was subjugated and enslaved by Zacharias as a provocation to the Von Carnsteins, serving senselessly in his personal retinue ever since.

effects.description: Melee Attack: +15 for Skeleton infantry units
Melee Defence: +15 for Skeleton infantry units

items.colour_text: The Everliving haunted the Forests of Shadows for generations, under iron rule by the cunning, sly and deadly Zacharias the Everliving. This all ended brutally as his own kin, Melchior betrayed him. The Everliving follow Zacharias still however, as he plots his ultimate revenge.

effects.description:
Hit points: +15%
	(assigned unit)

Missile resistance: 20%
	(assigned unit)

items.colour_text: The Jewel in the center of this unholy object has the power of invoking on the bearer the protection of the gods of lost Nehekhara. It is most sought after by rival Lords of the night, who would do anything to claim this artifact for their own.

effects.description: Spell resistance: 15%
Ability: "Circlet of Rathek''
